invalidSubcommand.title: Invalid subcommand
invalidSubcommand.description: The subcommand you provided is invalid. Please check the /help command for more information.

errorWhileExecutingCommand.title: Error while executing command
errorWhileExecutingCommand.description: An error occurred while executing the command. Please try again later.

invalidLanguage.title: Invalid language
invalidLanguage.description: The language you provided is invalid.

success.title: Language set
success.description: The language has been set to {language}.

roleNotFoundError.title: :x:  Role not found
roleNotFoundError.description: The role you provided was not found in this server.

managedRoleAssignError.title: :x:  Managed role
managedRoleAssignError.description: I can't assign or remove the role {role} because it is managed by an integration.

hierarchyRoleAssignError.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
hierarchyRoleAssignError.description: I can't assign or remove the role {role} because it is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above the role you want me to manage.

alreadyAutoRoleWarning.title: :x:  Already an auto role
alreadyAutoRoleWarning.description: The role {role} is already an auto role.

success.title: :white_check_mark:  Auto role added
success.description: The role {role} has been added as an auto role.

notAutoRoleError.title: :x:  Not an auto role
notAutoRoleError.description: The role {role} is not an auto role.

success.title: :white_check_mark:  Auto role removed
success.description: The role {role} has been removed as an auto role.

success.title: Auto roles
success.description: The auto roles for this server are:

noManageRolesPermissionError.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
noManageRolesPermissionError.description: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member, but was unable to do so because I don't have the "Manage Roles" permission. Please ensure that I have the necessary permissions to manage roles in your server settings.
noManageRolesPermissionError.dmDescription: :wave: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member in {serverName}, but was unable to do so because I don't have the "Manage Roles" permission. Please ensure that I have the necessary permissions to manage roles in your server settings.

hierarchyRoleAssignError.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
hierarchyRoleAssignError.description: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member, but was unable to do so because the role I was trying to assign is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above every role you want me to manage.
hierarchyRoleAssignError.dmDescription: :wave: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member in {serverName}, but was unable to do so because the role I was trying to assign is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above every role you want me to manage.
